channel.title: Python on ssebs | Sebastian Safari
channel.description: Recent content in Python on ssebs | Sebastian Safari

item.title: Dank Nooner (v1)
item.description:
Github Repo

Play v1 now!

What is it?

Dank Nooner V1 is a wheelie challenge game where you try to hold a wheelie for as long as you can & earn points to upgrade your bike. V2 is coming soon with a full open-world experience!

item.title: Guac and Load
item.description: Interested in the behind-the-scenes? Check out dev update 1 and update 2.

item.title: Simpleshare
item.description:
Github Repo

A local file sharing utility written in Python. Utilized multicast UDP to create an easy to use local network file sharing application. There’s a simple GUI to enable ease of use for non-technical users.

item.title: CSV Editor
item.description:
Github Repo

A lightweight GUI csv editor written in python.

item.title: Creating Procedural Animations to Save Time in Godot
item.description:
Github repo for this blog | GitHub repo for DankNooner

What is Dank Nooner?

Dank Nooner is a motorcycle stunt game built in Godot. The v1 proof of concept is a simple wheelie balance challenge game where you hold a wheelie as long as you can and earn points to upgrade your bike.

item.title: Guac and Load Update #2: Lessons learned & Retro
item.description: This is the second Guac & Load update, check out the first one to see how I got started.

item.title: Guac and Load Dev Update #1: Cooking Up Gameplay and Spicy Bugs
item.description:
Check out the Steam store page and the project page

What’s Guac and Load?

Guac and Load is what I’m calling my first 3D video game. It’s a fast-paced restaurant sim where chaos in the kitchen leads to a fight for survival.

item.title: 3D printing and coding my Mini Macro Pad
item.description:
Read the technical details on the project page

What’s a Macro Pad?

Have you ever wanted to run a shortcut on your computer at the press of a button? Maybe you have a repetitive Excel task that you keep doing, or you want to add a “skip song” button on your keyboard.

item.title: nccsv
item.description:
Github Repo

Ncurses CSV Editor written in Python

TODO:

  • Architecture
    • Wireframes
      • Home / Menu
      • File selector
        • Open
        • Close
      • Editor
        • Layout Grid
        • Entry
  • Multiple views
    • Home / Menu
    • File selector
    • Editor
  • Custom widgets
    • Layout Grid
    • Entry (text editor with box)
  • Scroll down / right
  • [.] Delete contents of cell when you hit “DEL”
  • Row / Col bars (A,B,C, 1,2,3)
  • [.] Actually handle CSVs
  • Color
  • Documentation
  • Publish to pip
  • Tests

Misc folder is for miscellaneous test files to add features (pad scrolling, etc)
